TopicTitle: [1.12.x] Tundra Exploration - v7.0 (Nov 5th, 2023) - (Re)Stockalike SpaceX Falcon 9, (Crew) Dragon (XL) & Haven-1!

Articles.Content:
Including Iridium Next, New Horizons, Haven-1 and soon many more! (Check roadmap for what is coming)



Join me on Discord! (DEV talk only)

Tundra Exploration pics:

Spoiler






 





Tundra Technologies pics:

Spoiler











Planned features

  • Roadmap

 

Known issues

  • "No tank type named 'RR_CryoMLOX' exists" means you have RR but not CRP, or you have RR, CRP, and WBI classic stock, and the WBI feature isn't working right.  Make sure you have RR 1.16!

 

Required Mods

  • Kerbal Reusability Expansion (For the F9 legs and grid fins)
  • B9 Part Switch                           (For part switching)
  • Module manager                       (For all your module manager needs)

Recommended Mods

  • FreeIVA (So you can fly around inside Rodan and Gaira-1 parts!
  • Modular Launch Pads (For those awesome towers)
  • Waterfall (For those amazing plumes)
  • Smokescreen (Realplume NOT required!)
  • Flight Manager for Reusable Stages (For landing your F9 first stage)
  • Omega482's Stockalike Structures NTR (For your Ghidorah landing needs)
  • Basic DeltaV - Basic Orbit by DMagic (For better understanding of how much fuel you have to land all your crafts safely back)
  • Tundra's Space Center (To launch from LC-40!)
  • Near Future Solar    (For the Solar Panel plugin if you want full 180 degree tracking)


Not supported Mods

  • Atmospheric autopilot
  • FAR (Version 7.0 looks to perform a lot better)



Beta versions on GitHub

A very special thanks to @Beale, @CobaltWolf and @Nertea for the help and advise they gave me to make something awesome. And @DiscoSlelge for creating those awesome patches!
And a massive thanks to @ValiZockt, @Rock3tman_, @Nessus_, @JadeOfMaar, @Starwaster, @neistridlar, @SofieBrink and @Infinite Monkeys for the help they gave me making this mod perfect!
